sbsSection.heading: Sagnse Beauty Supply
sbsSection.description: Looking for a quick, easy, and customizable style ? Sagnse Beauty Supply is made for you.

how_they_look_with_us.heading: How they pop with us
how_they_look_with_us.description: Figures from all around the globe, from various industries, are shining with us !

who_are_we.heading: Who are we
who_are_we.description: More than a brand and a hair salon, as Sagnse, we defines ourselves as a lifestyle, that of 1 address, several choices, services and products. So ladies, please experience a complete, unique offer inspired by African traditions for all your beauty rituals.
